Room.Name: North Plasnelt Park
Room.ShortDescription: You are in North Plasnelt Park, near the west bank of the Baldywyne.
Room.LongDescription: The water is cold and deep, and the river is wide at this point. Willow trees line the bank, and small boats are pulled up on the shore. there is a short pier extending into the water. Shady elms and other ornamental trees line the park walks. A short path goes under South Bridge.
